price: Kuma idan kã gan su, sai jikunansu su bã ka sha'awa kuma idan sun faɗa,* zã ka saurãra ga maganarsu. Kamar dai sũ ƙyami ne wanda aka jingine. Sunã zaton kõwace tsãwa a kansu take. Sũ ne maƙiyan, sai ka yi saunarsu. Allah Yã la'ane su. Yãya ake karkatar da su?
arabic: ۞ وَإِذَا رَأَيۡتَهُمۡ تُعۡجِبُكَ أَجۡسَامُهُمۡۖ وَإِن يَقُولُواْ تَسۡمَعۡ لِقَوۡلِهِمۡۖ كَأَنَّهُمۡ خُشُبٞ مُّسَنَّدَةٞۖ يَحۡسَبُونَ كُلَّ صَيۡحَةٍ عَلَيۡهِمۡۚ هُمُ ٱلۡعَدُوُّ فَٱحۡذَرۡهُمۡۚ قَٰتَلَهُمُ ٱللَّهُۖ أَنَّىٰ يُؤۡفَكُونَ
footnotes: * Munãfukai sunã da kyawun sũrar jiki kuma sun iya magana da fasaha amma fa bã su da hankali sabõda ƙaryar da suke a kanta, sabõda haka sunã tsõron kõwane irin mõtsi ya zama a kansu.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wa-idhā ra-aytahum tuʿ'jibuka ajsāmuhum wa-in yaqūlū tasmaʿ liqawlihim ka-annahum khushubun musannadatun yaḥsabūna kulla ṣayḥatin ʿalayhim humu al-ʿaduwu fa-iḥ'dharhum qātalahumu al-lahu annā yu'fakūna
